TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XamlSchemaContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 定义一个可重用上下文，用于解释或映射 XAML 类型以及为这些类型提供支持的程序集中的类型。

span.span: Defines a reusable context for interpreting or mapping XAML types, and the types in the assemblies that underlie them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XAML 架构上下文为 XAML 中的架构或词汇和特定的分析器实现提供了一个抽象层。A XAML schema context provides a layer of abstraction between a schema or vocabulary for XAML, and a specific parser implementation. 通过插入架构上下文的概念，架构可与不同 XAML 分析器一起使用，架构上下文会填充与特定 XAML 分析器交互所需的详细信息。By inserting the concept of a schema context, the schema can be used with different XAML parsers, and the schema context fills in the details that are needed to interact with a specific XAML parser. 例如，XAML 架构上下文提供与 xaml 概念或 CLR 到 XAML 类型系统的绑定相关的查询 Api。For example, the XAML schema context provides query APIs that relate to XAML concepts or to the CLR binding to the XAML type system. XAML 架构上下文还负责维护已加载程序集的程序集列表，该列表定义 XAML 分析器查找后备类型的位置。The XAML schema context is also responsible for maintaining the assembly list of loaded assemblies, which defines where a XAML parser looks for backing types.

para.span: 在中 ， 可以在多个调用方之间共享，这包括完全和部分信任调用方。

span.span: In an , a can be shared between multiple callers, which include both full and partial trust callers.

para.span: 这种情况存在于 WPF 等框架中，后者为 WPF 应用程序模型的某些部分提供对 XAML 加载的部分信任访问。

span.span: This situation exists in frameworks such as WPF, which provide partial-trust access to XAML loading for portions of the WPF application model.

para.span: 默认 实现通过使其所有属性和设置保持不变，来提供此方案中的安全措施。

span.span: The default implementation provides safeguards in this scenario by keeping all its properties and settings immutable.

para.span: 派生实现还应考虑遵循 XAML 架构上下文属性和设置的此不可变性模型。

span.span: Derived implementations should also consider following this model of immutability for properties and settings of a XAML schema context.

para.span: 基类的设计目的是让查找不会有外部可观察到的副作用。

span.span: The base class is designed so that lookups have no externally observable side effects.

para.span: 基类（如或）中的 api 所引用的类型 也不会从查找中产生副作用。

span.span: The types that are referenced by APIs in the base class, such as or , also produce no side effects from lookups.

para.span: 要进行架构确定所需的所有数据都应在的构造和设置中提供 。

span.span: All data that is needed to make a schema determination should be available from the construction and settings of the .

para.span: 请注意，任何查找 Api 都不依赖于显式传递的服务;其输入仅依赖于字符串输入。

span.span: Notice that no lookup APIs rely on explicitly passed-in services; their input relies on string input only.

para.span: 基类、和 在其基实现中都是线程安全的。

span.span: The base class, and and are all thread safe in their base implementations.

para.span: 如果派生自 或派生 XAML 类型系统类（如 和 ），则可以选择类是否会表现为线程安全。

span.span: If you derive from or derive XAML type system classes such as and , you can choose whether your classes will behave as thread safe.

summary.span: 提供一个非标准 实现，该实现不调用 。

span.span: Provides a nonstandard implementation that does not invoke .

remarks.format: ## Remarks XAML 架构上下文不应由自动垃圾回收或手动操作释放。XAML schema contexts should not be disposed by automatic garbage collection or by manual operations. 尽管 XAML 架构上下文没有非托管资源，但 属性可能仍处于活动状态，并且释放 XAML 架构上下文可能会干扰相关的延迟加载操作。Although XAML schema contexts have no unmanaged resources, properties might still be active, and disposing a XAML schema context can interfere with the related defer-load operation. 在内部作为弱引用挂钩的事件处理程序将通过此实现进行清理。 event handlers, which are hooked internally as weak references, are cleaned up by this implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回 在构造函数签名的设置中建立的值 。This property returns the value that is established in the settings for the constructor signature. 如果使用其他签名进行构造，或者如果 未专门设置为 `true` ，则此属性的值为 `false` 。If other signatures were used for construction or if is not specifically set to `true`, the value of this property is `false`. 此属性的值将影响所返回的字符串 。The value of this property influences the strings that are returned by . 如果 为 `true` ，则字符串的程序集部分报告的等效 。If is `true`, the assembly portion of the string reports the equivalent of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当引用程序集通过构造或属性设置传入时，此方法才会搜索它们。This method only searches the reference assemblies if they are passed in through construction or property setting. 如果没有将程序集建立为引用程序集，则此方法的逻辑将检查此活动的所有加载的程序集 。If no assemblies are established as reference assemblies, the logic of this method examines all loaded assemblies where this is active.

summary.span: 在操作使用此架构上下文来解析程序集时调用，必须提供该程序集才能解析它包含的 XAML 命名空间。

span.span: Called when operations use this schema context to resolve an assembly that is required in order to resolve the XAML namespaces that it contains.
The resolved assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基础程序集解析技术是一个内部 API，它具有基于构造行为的程序集名称的不同字符串形式的内置容差 。The underlying assembly resolution technique, which is an internal API, has built-in tolerances for different string forms of an assembly name as based on the construction behavior. 此 API 的用途是对已知的程序集集（例如针对引用程序集而不是全局程序集缓存）启用第一次机会解析。The purpose of this API is to enable first-opportunity resolution against known sets of assemblies, such as against reference assemblies instead of against a global assembly cache. 如果填充了引用程序集的列表，则默认实现可以访问已知的引用程序集。If the list of reference assemblies is populated, the default implementation can access the known reference assemblies.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回 在构造函数签名的设置中建立的值 。This property returns the value that is established in the settings for the constructor signature. 如果将其他签名用于构造，或如果 未专门设置为 `true` ，则此属性的值为 `false` 。If other signatures are used for construction or if is not specifically set to `true`, the value of this property is `false`. XAML 规范 [6.6.7.2]、节不会专门解决标记扩展的重复 arity。Duplicate arity of markup extensions is not specifically addressed by the XAML specification [MS-XAML], section 6.6.7.2. 这是因为，无论标记扩展实现中可能存在的重复 arity 如何，标记扩展的 XAML 信息项的形式都是相同的。This is because formation of the XAML information item for a markup extension is identical regardless of duplicate arity that might exist in the markup extension implementation. 只有标记扩展的实际调用及其 `ProvideValue` 公开与重复 arity 相关的任何问题。Only the actual invocation of the markup extension and its `ProvideValue` exposes any issues associated with duplicate arity. 这样，处理重复 arity 的行为将是不确定的，并且会保持每个实现 XAML 架构上下文及其 XAML 编写器集成。Behavior for handling duplicate arity is thus undefined and is left up to each implementing XAML schema context and its XAML writer integration. 为 .NET Framework XAML 服务操作实现的默认 XAML 架构上下文不支持重复 arity;各种 .NET Framework XAML 服务 Api 在处理具有基础重复 arity 的标记扩展用法时将引发异常。The default XAML schema context as implemented for .NET Framework XAML Services operations does not support duplicate arity; various .NET Framework XAML Services APIs will throw exceptions when processing markup extension usage with underlying duplicate arity. 有关定义标记扩展的详细信息，请参阅 [XAML 的标记扩展概述](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/markup-extensions-for-xaml-overview)。For more information about defining markup extensions, see [Markup Extensions for XAML Overview](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/markup-extensions-for-xaml-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool TryGetCompatibleXamlNamespace (string xamlNamespace, out string compatibleNamespace);

param.name: xamlNamespace
param.span: 要检查是否存在兼容结果的 XAML 命名空间的 字符串。

span.span: The string for the XAML namespace to be checked for a compatible result.

param.name: compatibleNamespace
param.span: 当此方法返回时，为兼容的 XAML 命名空间请求的 字符串。

span.span: When this method returns, the string for a compatible XAML namespace request.

param.span: 如果方法返回 ，则这可能与 相同。

span.span: This might be identical to if the method returns .

summary.span: 返回兼容 XAML 命名空间的请求的成功或失败状态。

span.span: Returns the success or failure of a request for a compatible XAML namespace.

summary.span: 成功的请求会将该 XAML 命名空间报告为输出参数。

span.span: A successful request reports that XAML namespace as an out parameter.

returns.span: 如果 包含可用的结果，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if contains a usable result; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在内部使用以下查找顺序：Internally, this method uses the following lookup order: 1. 内部实现的兼容性字典，它可能已由之前的查找填充。An internally implemented compatibility dictionary, which may have been populated by an earlier lookup. 2. 参数求值。The parameter evaluation. 如果未发现任何其他兼容的命名空间，并且此方法返回 `false` ，则 `compatibleNamespace` 参数输出可能与输入具有相同的值 `xamlNamespace` 。If no other compatible namespace is discovered and this method returns `false`, the `compatibleNamespace` parameter output might have the same value as the `xamlNamespace` input.

span.span: is .
